contents: Examples Markdown syntax - https://hugo-terminal.vercel.app/posts/markdown-syntax/ Link is Here  A bunch of code here  List  first second third   first second third   first  second  third       Blockquotes  test - Hi there  first second    Code Block markdown <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head>  <meta charset="UTF-8">  <title>Example HTML5 Document</title> </head> <body>  <p>Test</p> </body> </html> shortCode html    <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>Example HTML5 Document</title> </head> <body> <p>Test</p> </body> </html>   golang shortCode go demo_controller.go    // SetupWithManager sets up the controller with the Manager. func (r *DemoReconciler) SetupWithManager(mgr ctrl.Manager) error { return ctrl.NewControllerManagedBy(mgr). For(&demoappv1.Demo{}). Owns(&corev1.Service{}). Owns(&appsv1.Deployment{}). Complete(r) }   additional example css Really cool snippet    pre { background: #1a1a1d; padding: 20px; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 1rem; overflow: auto; @media (--phone) { white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; } code { background: none !important; color: #ccc; padding: 0; font-size: inherit; } }    Table    col1 col2     1 4   2 5   3 6   test table    image Hello
